title: National Aviation Heritage Area: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar         Special event on the plaza at Wright-Dunbar Interpretive Center. Photo courtesy of Dayton Daily News  Events  There are many events that occur at all of the National Aviation Heritage Area sites, including Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park.  We encourage you to visit each site's webpage to discover upcoming events which coincide with your visit.  You can visit the Dayton Aviation Heritage NHP calendar page to select a range of dates to view any/all events that are planned for your selection.
